name: matibot-site
description: Minification build tools for MatiBot Jekyll site

scripts.minify:css: cleancss -o css/grayscale.min.css css/grayscale.css && cleancss -o css/timeline.min.css css/timeline.css && cleancss -o css/syntax.min.css css/syntax.css
scripts.minify: npm run minify:js && npm run minify:css
